column1: # July and August readings for 1926-1930 are marked as estimates or allocated:
# 1927 and 1929 are allocated and have been retained
# 1926, 1928 and 1930 are estimated and have been omitted.
# Readings for July-October 1933 are estimates and have been omitted.
# The gauge moved 400 yards to the southern side of the village in August 1934.
